features: 【Travel Steamer for Clothes】: This mini steamer is the ultimate travel companion. It fits easily into your suitcases and backpacks, so you can always look sharp and wrinkle-free wherever you go. Whether you need to iron your clothes at home, in your dorm, or on the road, this travel steamer can handle any fabric with ease. It's a must-have for your life and your student apartment.

【Quality materials】: This travel steamer features a ceramic panel that is smooth and anti-scratch, with a large contact area that can iron out wrinkles quickly and efficiently. It also has evenly distributed steam holes that produce continuous and strong steam, allowing you to iron deep wrinkles without damaging the fabric. You can use it for dry or wet ironing, depending on your preference.

【1000W & 5s Fast Heating】: This steamer has a high power of 1000W, which can heat up to a constant temperature of 302°F in just 5 seconds. It only takes 3 minutes to iron a shirt, making it easy and effortless for you to iron clothes, curtains, bed sheets, and more. It also has a triangular tip design that enables 360° ironing, making it convenient to iron narrow areas like shirt buttons, plackets, and blazer/dress collars. This steamer is truly a home essential and a college apartment essential

【Portable & Comfortable】: This mini steamer has a foldable handle that can rotate 180°, making it easy to store and carry. It can iron clothes both flat and hanging, giving you more flexibility and convenience. It weighs only 1.37 pounds and has a maximum length of 6 inches, so it is comfortable to hold and use. You can iron clothes for a long time with this steamer without feeling tired or sore.

【Unique design】: This 2-in-1 steamer for clothes is carefully designed by a professional team based on customer demand data. It has a unique beauty tip design that not only allows you to iron flat clothing fabrics, but also to iron clothing buttons, collars, and other subtle positions with ease. You can achieve the perfect ironing effect with this steamer.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 2-in-1 steamer for clothes mini steamer for clothes Do you often worry about wrinkled clothes when you travel or go on a business trip? Do you want a multifunctional mini steam iron that can both steam and dry iron? Do you want a portable and practical home essential? If your answer is yes, then this travel steamer for clothes is your best choice!

Efficiency: This steamer is powerful and fast, with 1000W of high power and 5 seconds of rapid heating. It can iron clothes at a constant temperature of 302°F, which is suitable for most fabrics. It only takes 3 minutes to iron a shirt, so you can finish your ironing tasks quickly and easily. You can also use it to iron curtains, bed sheets, and other household items.

Comfort: This steamer is designed to be user-friendly and ergonomic. It has a foldable handle that can rotate 180°, making it easy to store and carry. It can iron clothes both flat and hanging, so you can choose the best way according to your needs. It weighs only 1.37 pounds and has a maximum length of 6 inches, so it is comfortable to hold and use. You won't feel tired or sore after ironing clothes for a long time with this steamer

Uniqueness: This steamer is not just a regular steamer, but a 2-in-1 steamer that can also work as a mini steam iron. It has a unique beauty tip design that allows you to iron flat clothing fabrics as well as clothing buttons, collars, and other subtle positions. You can easily achieve the perfect ironing effect with this steamer!

Portability: This steamer is compact and lightweight, so you can easily put it in your suitcase or backpack without taking up too much space. Whether you are at home, in a college dorm, or on the road, you can use this steamer anytime and anywhere to keep your clothes neat and fresh.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great steamer for travel
reviews.reviewText: Small and combat. Started steaming immediately after filling and turning on. There was a few drops that leaked around the plate at first but it stopped once everything go good and heated up. The metal plate is nice for pressing stubborn wrinkles but you must be careful not to set it down on anything but the plate tray or it will burn surfaces. It doesn’t stand up right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for money
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect iron for those who travel a lot for work. Super fast heating, steam available almost immediately! It worked out pretty well. Perfect for someone like me who wears a business suit a lot! Would definitely recommend it!
